local_intent: Execute the corrective 0.1 m push at 90 deg on t_block after confirming visibility and alignment, then verify proximity to the T-outline.
assumptions: Yaw already set to 90 from prior step
Robot is already near the push face from preceding approach
coherence_with_global: Matches the second Push in GLOBAL_BT (t_block, distance 0.1, direction_deg 90, timeout_ms 1200). Preserves the initial visibility/scan pattern, re-detects and re-aligns before pushing, and checks goal attainment with IsAt.
